title: IM TIRED
body:
*FUCK IT! OR YOU ARE 5 VS 5 or this shit is impossible .
 Ah yea?! You solve tha flaming / blaming in lobby " Cause everyone gets what he wants... but when you get in game and your top feeds cause he sucks...GOD DAMN! or when no one picks a fucking front line ...DAMN ! You also have that motherfucker that has 0 WINS in RANKS but somehow he is SILVER and gets in the same game as I . Lets no talk about the stupid duos...O im duo but i got top as secondary and i want to go adc with my premade let me pick my JINX and obligate the guy who got adc to go TOP, YEAH SURE !!! So as many many others...This is my stupid post . I miss old solo queue and right now if you are not with 3 or 5 guys premade ranks pretty much suck whether you are SILVER or PLAT - DIAMOND.  BUT IN BASIC TERM RITO SAID .I. 
> WE MADE A BIG SHIT AND WE ARE WORKING TO GIVE IT THIS LOOK  http://s1.dmcdn.net/HP3do/1280x720-QDR.jpg
